489530.name: Road to Ballhalla Soundtrack
489530.description:
Tracklist:


01 - Hubworld
02 - T(ortu)rial
03 - Linear Entertainment
04 - Moving, Not Touching
05 - Twists And Turns
06 - Fury Rolled
07 - The Dimension Deception
08 - Temple of the Holy Fail
09 - Memento Mori
10 - Roll Of Thirds
11 - Miss Marble
12 - True Grid
13 - Survival 101
14 - Precision Is Key
15 - Through the Rolling Bass - Part I
16 - Through the Rolling Bass - Part II
17 - Pun's Labyrinth
18 - Hiccup Curse
19 - A Marble Caroll
20 - You've Got Some Balls
21 - Ballbossa, The Boss Ball
22 - Ascension To Ballhalla
23 - Bonus - Roll The Line
24 - Bonus - Force Push
25 - Bonus - Red Dead
26 - Bonus - Roads in the Sky

All music and in-game sound effects composed and produced by Emmy-nominated composer Nicholas Singer.
489530.supported_languages:
英语*, 德语*, 法语*, 意大利语*, 西班牙语 - 西班牙*
